title: Raw Real Relevant®
description:
Raw Real Relevant is a podcast that questions everything. 
It’s for the creative beatniks and seekers of the world who know they’re built for more. 

It’s a community podcast that, In a society where there is very little that promotes healing and very much that undermines it, is normalizing real, one unscripted conversation at time. 

If you’re like me and you’re tired of the bullshit — the bro marketing gimmicks, self-help gurus and business podcasts out there that claim to know it all then you’re in the right place. 

Join me—your host, Talie, as I navigate topics on all things culture, personal dev, human potential, the physics of how this reality works and more, intended to help you be who you need to be to build what you want to build. 

It’s caffeine fueled, it’s heart-felt and it’s real.

++++++++++++++ IG: @taliemiller @rawrealrelevant Pinterest: @taliemiller TikTok: @taliemiller www.taliemiller.com // www.rawrealrelevant.co

title: LEER
description: JENNA is an 18-year old in 1995, returning to her coastal hometown after months away grieving the sudden loss of her father. At a beach party with her best friend LIZ, the two cross paths with a mysterious young man named JADE, whose interest in Jenna seems beyond the physical realm. A love story at its heart, LEER marries nostalgic horror and existential romance as Jenna is unwittingly drawn into a plot to reunite two soulmates separated by death.

title: Two Can Talk Podcast
description: Hello and welcome everyone! This Podcast is where two childhood friends come together and share about an hours worth of content of just total random and bizarre topics that will have you laughing till the end, also in hopes to fill someone's day with a little happiness while at work or having a relaxing day in the Bahamas, whomst ever is always welcomed to join. Allow us to introduce ourselves as the hosts of this channel; Landen and Antonio. The two of us have been almost inseparable since the moment we met in a 3rd grade classroom up into our now early 20's. I'm sure you can only imagine the memories we have to share to everyone. If you're interested to find out more about us join us on the show!

title: Cyber Psychos: A Cyberpunk Red Podcast
description:
Live play of the table top role playing game ( TTRPG) Cyberpunk Red from R.Talsorian Games.  5 Players are sent into Night City on various tasks but it's always their choice which way they go.  With the improv style game play, hilarity ensues.  This "radio theater" is ripe with sound effects and original music.  Join Banthar, Sly, Heretic, Scythe, and Brock Stockton as they get into all the trouble with a new episode every other week.  

GM, Music, and editing by Jon Feist

Instagram: @cyberpunkredgm

Nat Mundy - Scythe - Dylon Dylon Dylon Butros Butros Butros III

Chris Garrison - Banthar - Ashe Manuel Pablo Romaine Gonzales Smith

title: The Dungeon Boiz
description:
The Dungeon Boiz is an exciting, creative, and fun(ny) podcast that uses the framework of the classic tabletop role-playing game ’Dungeons and Dragons’ (5th edition) to tell stories of adventurers setting out to save their towns, cities, worlds, and galaxies. Join us on these journeys as we explore new adventures, encounter dangerous new worlds, and hopefully make new friends along the way. 

​The Dungeon Boiz now presents their first campaign: Stardust Echos. Stardust Echos is a science fiction, high fantasy, Dungeon and Dragons, home brew campaign. Like most D&D campaigns, this will be a game based on choices, imagination, and most of all, fate. Come laugh and explore with us!  

Due to the improv nature of The Dungeon Boiz and other RPG content on our channels, some themes and situations that occur in-game may be difficult for some to handle (may contain mature language and content). Content warnings can always be found in the episode description below. This podcast is 100% intended for mature audiences only.

title: POTATO: Possibilities Of Time And Things Overthere
description:
The planet Overthere has discovered Earth.
Earth has no idea where the peace-loving Overthere is, which makes picking a fight with it tricky.

Several years on, Earth is fully ensconced in its inferiority complex, speculation of imminent attack is rife.

And here's our aimless Polly, obliviously bumbling along, only to be rudely interrupted one night by a knock on the door and a visit from a friendly-looking 'alien' who gives her a code to unlock her life, the universe and anything she wants.

Starting with nothing, absolute zero, a pigeon, creativity and playing in the invisible worlds of philosophy, psychology, dreams and faith, how does one create the life they want? What would it be like to live forever? And did your cousin Vince really get abducted all those years ago and returned as a fish finger?

title: The View From My Middle Finger
description:
Welcome to this new podcast series, The view from my Middle finger, where we take a look at the world through the many, social media platforms.

With 3 seasons now streaming, we deliver a mix of entertainment in each series.

Series 1- The View From My Middle Finger- we cover many different topics which are highlighted through social media and the internet.
We look at the absurd side of society, the changing landscape and how we all navigate our way through the obstacles, in our own individual way.
With a healthy does of scepticism and humour, in some cases we highlight the illogical and the ridiculous.

Season 2- The Celebrity I Didn't Interview- In this short series we virtually interview some well known celebrities.

Season 3- AI Independent News- Who said that you need humans to deliver the news, well here at AI Independent News, we say to hell with humans, as our team of AI reporters deliver the news in their own inimitable style.
If you don't trust main stream media, then why not give AI Independent News a listen to, AI reporters deliver the news without the bullshit, as they are machine learning and haven't learnt bullshit yet. 

The View From My Middle Finger is sponsored by Tee Public, check out our merchandise in our Tee Public Store- https://www.teepublic.com/stores/the-view-from-my-middle-finger?ref_id=26524

title: Eerie
description:
Welcome to Eerie, a podcast where the veil of the mundane is lifted to expose the chilling, mysterious, and bizarre. Join your host, Noah, as he delves into the darkest corners of the world, uncovering chilling tales of true crime, spine-tingling paranormal encounters, ancient folklore, and pulse-pounding horrors. Each episode explores the strange and unexplained, revealing a world that exists just beyond the edges of your imagination.

With captivating storytelling and meticulous research, Noah invites you to embark on a journey that will keep you up at night, questioning the very fabric of reality. Eerie doesn't shy away from the macabre, embracing the eerie and unsettling with open arms.

So dim the lights, get comfortable, and step into the eerie. The shadows await, and the strange world that exists in the unknown beckons. Are you ready to discover what lurks in the darkness?

title: Parker Duque
description:
PROGRESS: a sophomoric case for optimism is read by author Parker Duque.. 

You know what you can’t stop?  Progress.  

As an heir to the Duque Industrial Fixtures fortune, Parker Duque had everything, except his family’s good looks, but as everybody knows, less than average looks don’t matter when you’re ultra-rich.  Parker Duque had a trust fund, fake ambition, and a beautiful girlfriend who loved him instead of his money.  Then one night, Parker lost everything.  His well-meaning father had bankrupted the family company and their fortune was gone.  His beautiful girlfriend who loved him instead of his money left him too.  Would this rich kid sink or swim?

When we catch up with Parker Duque he’s completing the sale of his real estate interests to his partners/employers, “the best f***ing day of his life.”  This rich kid, against all odds, has become a self-made man. 

The euphoria of renewed self-worth wouldn’t last though, as Parker finds out his wife is cheating on him, and the world is about to be blown in two -- by aliens.  Can you imagine what it must be like to have everything, lose it, build it back yourself through years and years of hard work and struggle, and then lose it yet again?  But this time you were losing it because aliens were going to blow the earth in two?  Aliens?  It was hard for Parker too.  

With only a week (or two) left, would Parker Duque save the planet?  

“F*** that.”  Parker Duque was a realist.  There were several things Parker wanted to do with his last two weeks on Earth but first he had to escape “The Nest” where he’s being held by Dusty and Peaches, an odd pair of government agents.  Peaches, despite her morbid obesity, was an impossibly athletic, accomplished hitwoman, and Dusty, despite his small stature, had a vise-like grip and moved through the shadows like a gazelle, a tiny gazelle.  She was the largest woman in comfort shoes he had ever seen, and Parker knew she and the tiny man with the quick temper would prove to be a formidable duo...

Can Parker Escape?  What will he do if he does?  Is it really the end of the world?  Buckle up because there’s so much more, and it’s a wild and hilarious ride the entire way through…

Mindflayers have begun appearing across the land. People are going missing in the Dwarven stronghold-city of Deepshield. We take Dungeons and Dragons seriously from the grim moments to the gaffs and gags - but we're not about to teach your 6 year old any unfortunate vocabulary words or off-color jokes.

title: Skit Your Shorts: The Short Stories Sketch Comedy Podcast

Skit Your Shorts is a short stories sketch comedy podcast hosted by comedy writer, Dutch Foley, and an evil-ish AI program named, Plot Bot 9000. Each week, Plot Bot challenges Dutch and his friends with the task of making him laugh with hilarious sketches and short stories. If they fail to launch his giggle code, (01101000 01100001) he promises to initiate the robot wars and destroy all humans. Can comedy save the world? Find out in the next episode!

While listening Skit Your Shorts, you may laugh, you may cry, or you may drive your car into a burning building. If the latter, ask yourself, "am I a moth? Why else would I drive straight into this shining ball of fire? Who gave a moth a driver's license?"

While you're busy contemplating your mortality, someone else should be calling the fire department. I bet the firefighters look just like in those calendars full of beefy hunks welcoming you into each month. Just kidding, they're probably all out of shape. Why else would the building still be on fire long enough for you to drive into it? Beefcakes would have been there in seconds. Firetruck? Forget it, musclefighters run to the scene and flex until the flames cower and dissipate.

Tune in weekly for the best comedy podcast that no one is listening to!

title: Metagaming Monstrosity
description: It's around 2014 and the world is falling to pieces, magically speaking. Despite the increase in unexplainable disasters and missing people, the U.S. government's own "Council of Human Development" has made no moves since the 1980's. So, a member of the DoE tries yet again to form an underground group aimed at protecting people before it's too late. Too bad it's these guys... This is a set of test recordings from a homebrew modern world based on mythos built up over 2 unrecorded campaigns (technically 1 and 1/2, since the "second" campaign used the same characters). System used is Monster of the Week, a Powered by The Apocalypse game created by Michael Sands. It's been heavily customized and most likely none of us are following the rules as intended. Note: A lot of the beginning of this was recorded on a 15 dollar recorder. Everyone makes mouth noises even when we try not to, and hopefully over time I will be able to make the players stop chewing on all of the equipment and hitting each other.

title: Emin Afandi's Universe of Roast
description:
Hello Europe! This is Emin , I am from Azerbaijan , your sponsor of Gas this Winter! You are welcome! For those who don't know where is Azerbaijan, Azerbaijan is right between Russia and Iran, which is a very two-girls one-cup situation. I am a stand-up comedian from Berlin, Germany, and my style of comedy is realistic, dark & insulting. And this is exactly what I am planning to do on this podcast. Discuss everyday life situations, art, movies, contests, and roast them.

I think we need to get acquainted a little bit better. I was born as a very chubby kid, my mother did not know whether she delivered a baby, or a planet. My chemistry teacher put my name in a periodic table of elements under the heavy metal group. I was the only kid ay my school who played Saturn without the ring, as it just did not fit! I left Azerbaijan when I was 16, because my father said that the economy of Azerbaijan was not strong to feed me any more...

Interested in finding out more? Then come and join my Universe of Roast.

Brothas’ Having Breakfast is a locally produced comedy show,consisting of a group of unique personalities. We ask that, all of our guests and listeners engage with under two considerations:

2) And offer food for thought

Rather it be sports, politics, childcare, economics, or just for jokes; drop a comment, we want to hear your thoughts.

title: Sputnik Satellite Radio Show. Season 1
description:
A 1950's Fiction based on facts story.

Follow the backstory and timeline of three main characters from the musical dramedy; Radio Girl and how they converge to create the Sputnik Satellite Radio Show on KNIC 1150 Radio in 1957. Nick Nickolas is the unabashed bygone era big band singer turned radio DJ and station Manager of KNIC 1150 Radio. He is a redeemed anti-hero who struggles his whole life just to win. Darrell Lang designs and builds KNIC 1150 Radio. He is a wounded WW1 veteran and former addict who becomes a multi-millionaire with his patented radio components and transistors. Tracy Albright suffers a head injury at a young age and struggles as a neurodivergent. She is a prodigy of radio wizard Darrell and is the young creator of the Sputnik Satellite Radio Show. Radio Girl becomes a national celebrity.
author_name: Blair Hebert,  Showrunner . Sputnik Satellite Radio Show .

title: Who Are You When No One Is Looking
description:
If you're looking for a fun podcast that can help improve your mental health then you're in the right place!

Do you feel torn between two dimensions within? It's your Devil & Angel talking! Hear them out loud in our new podcast to make sense of your real identity. Dave and Angelina will help us understand the dark and lighter aspects of humanity and our individual identity but with a sense of humor.

'Who are you when no one is looking' explores the concept of identity beneath the surface level. In this podcast, we're asking you the following question Who are you when no one is looking? We want you to release the labels, that society expects you to wear and go on a journey of self-discovery to realise that there is so much more to you than you might think.

Co-hosting the show with me is my Angel... Angela and Dave... my Devil. We’re talking subconscious mind, self-awareness, human psychology, emotional intelligence, astrology, and everything in between that makes up our identity.

follow us on Instagram for exclusive vlogs from Dave and Angela we're on IdentityTalkz / ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠YouTube Channel⁠⁠

Segrestats en la seva pròpia festa, es veuran obligats a seguir un joc macabre que els convertirà a tots en sospitosos i els abocarà a defensar la seva innocència, coneixent d’aquesta manera la idiosincràsia de la societat catalana de principis del segle XX, les relacions de poder existents, els problemes de l’opressió del proletariat i la consegüent guerra social, el pistolerisme, la política, l’exèrcit...

title: Creature Feature
description:
A creature of the week series featuring a group of horror enthusiasts “The Ghoul Gang” investigating strange happenings in the town of River’s End.

River’s End, once a bustling center of industry, is now a sleepy post-industrial retirement community whose best days seem regulated to the past with multiple boarded storefronts on Main Street and the last manufacturing plant STEELAM (once a cornerstone) set to layoff half its remaining workers. The only substantial employer left is ONECORP a biotech and pharmaceutical giant with links to both the town’s founders: the Langston Family, and the military. OneCorp’s lab, research and manufacturing facility looms on the north side of Lethe River jutting out of Weir Forest, frankensteined onto the site of the old observatory. It is here that the brilliant but haunted Dr. Lee Hux tests a unique antipsychotic "EtherX" using a VR mask called “A REBOURS” (“Against Nature”) on a man known only as The Subject.

title: Real Boys Real Talk
description:
Welcome to "Real Boys Real Talk" - a hilarious podcast where two friends, Justin and Tony, sit down and discuss whatever comes to their minds. These two goofballs are always up for a good laugh, and their chemistry is unmatched. With their quick wit and infectious personalities, Justin and Tony never fail to entertain their listeners.

In every episode, the pair covers a wide range of topics, from current events to pop culture to their own personal lives. They never shy away from controversial subjects or taboo topics, and their unapologetic honesty and humor make for a truly unique listening experience.

What sets this podcast apart is the way that Justin and Tony play off of each other's quirks and eccentricities. Justin is the more boisterous of the two, while Tony is the more laid-back and introspective. Together, they create a dynamic that is both hilarious and endearing.

Listeners can't get enough of the show's infectious energy and relatable humor. Whether they're dissecting the latest celebrity gossip or reminiscing about their own childhoods, Justin and Tony always manage to bring their own unique spin to the conversation.

So if you're looking for a podcast that will keep you laughing and entertained, look no further than "Real Boys Real Talk." These two friends are here to brighten up your day and make you forget all your worries, one hilarious episode at a time.

title: Valerie takes you to the movies.
description: My name is Valerie Smith and I would like to get you safely home. Have you ever tried to tape your laptop to your dashboard so you can watch a movie while driving. Neither have I, but if we've just thought it - someone's done it. I am here to take your imagination to the movies (in what my Pete says is a rather unique way). Come to think of it, I already know it's unique as there wasn't a category for this type of podcast, and I'm not too sure why. I am going to explain what I see (narrate - for those not in the know) a movie and you are going to safely listen. Together we will get you home with your head full of wonder and mystery. That I can guarantee. I should just let you know I might say a swear word on occasion (don't know if I should tick the explicit content box for that...) but if I see rude bits - you will truly have to use your imagination because I will not be going into detail, I may just cough a bit. I have children and I don't want them to think I'm on some sort of seedy side hustle, especially given my voice. There is a 4000 character maximum but I don't think I can fill it so instead of waffling (which I don't often do - so you'll be fine), we'll get right to it - Valerie takes you to the movies. By the way that picture is me, Valerie.

title: My Name is F-I-O-N-A
description:
Travel down the road with Pat Stewart as she deals with the turmoil and pleasures of modern life.

My Name Is F-I-O-N-A and Other Short Stories includes outrageous opinions, intriguing insights, purely fiction, and odd behaviors perpetrated by family members and other unforgettable characters. A spunky unborn baby learns how to use Morse code to tell her parents her name is Fiona. In another purely fiction story, sit down in a bar on the shady outskirts of Memphis when Patricia steals a kiss from Elvis. Read on to see Patricia’s patriotic camel Joe become belligerent when the President wants to send him to Afghanistan!

Inspired by actual events, Patricia Stewart’s essays reveal how she opened her heart and soul to help Hurricane Katrina-ravaged homeowners. She introduces you to Alicein (pronounced Allison) Wonderland who explains her hippie-inspired name and why she opened her Mockingbird Café in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

On a more serious note, Negroes into the Schools will take you to a street corner in Little Rock, Arkansas to witness this turning point in Civil Rights history.

You won’t be able to put this book down until you’ve read the last word.

title: Needeepinbeanz
description:
"Needeepinbeanz" is a captivating and lighthearted podcast that takes listeners on a delightful journey through the world of beans and beyond. With its unique blend of humor, curiosity, and exploration, this podcast is a perfect escape for those seeking both entertainment and education.

Hosted by a charismatic group of bean enthusiasts, the podcast dives deep into the diverse universe of beans – from the humble kidney bean to the exotic black-eyed pea. The hosts' infectious laughter and genuine enthusiasm for the subject matter make even the most mundane bean variety seem fascinating and exciting. Listeners will find themselves chuckling along as the hosts share quirky bean facts, engage in spirited debates about the best bean dishes, and even create bean-related challenges that test their culinary skills.

But "Needeepinbeanz" doesn't stop at beans – it's a treasure trove of random ideas and passionate discussions that span a wide range of topics. From dissecting the science behind the perfect cup of coffee to exploring conspiracy theories about ancient civilizations' connections to beans, every episode brings something new to the table. The hosts' boundless curiosity leads them to tackle subjects as diverse as astrophysics, underwater basket weaving, and the cultural significance of sock colors.

Listeners are in for a treat as they become immersed in the hosts' infectious enthusiasm for their passions. Whether they're embarking on a whimsical quest to discover the world's largest baked bean or engaging in a friendly debate about the merits of jelly beans versus chocolate-covered coffee beans, the hosts' chemistry and camaraderie make each episode a joy to listen to.

What sets "Needeepinbeanz" apart is its ability to find the humor and absurdity in the most unexpected places. The hosts' witty banter and clever commentary keep listeners engaged and entertained, even when delving into more serious topics. The podcast seamlessly transitions from lighthearted laughter to thought-provoking discussions, creating a dynamic listening experience that appeals to a wide audience.

With its charismatic hosts, eclectic array of topics, and a dash of bean-inspired charm, "Needeepinbeanz" offers a refreshing and hilarious take on podcasting. It's a podcast that celebrates the joy of learning, encourages embracing one's passions, and reminds us all to find humor in the everyday – even if that means taking a deep dive into the world of beans. So, whether you're a bean aficionado, a casual listener, or someone simply looking for a good laugh, "Needeepinbeanz" promises to be a podcast that leaves you both entertained and enlightened.

title: Mumbuki, le policier
description:
Dans un monde où les mystères et les phénomènes occultes semblent régner en maîtres, il est facile pour les hommes de succomber à la fascination de la toute-puissance. Les histoires de pouvoirs surnaturels et d'êtres aux capacités extraordinaires peuvent éveiller en nous une tentation de croire que nous aussi, nous sommes capables de tout. Pourtant, il est crucial de réaliser que cette toute-puissance n'est pas absolue, qu'elle a ses propres limites et que les hommes doivent en être conscients. Un exemple frappant de cette erreur de jugement peut être observé chez le policier ​Mumbuki, dont l'arrogance et la confiance en sa capacité à manipuler les événements le mènent vers des conséquences inattendues et dangereuses.

Dans cette histoire, maître Omra yezal explorera les dangers qui guettent ceux qui se laissent aveugler par l'apparente toute-puissance des forces occultes. Nous suivrons les pas de Mumbuki, un homme sûr de lui, mais qui se retrouvera confronté aux limites de ses propres pouvoirs, mettant en jeu sa vie et celles de ceux qui l'entourent. À travers son parcours, nous découvrirons que la véritable force réside dans la compréhension des limites de ce monde et surtout dans l'humilité de reconnaître que nous ne sommes pas tout-puissants et dans la prudence de ne pas se laisser aveugler par des illusions de grandeur que vendent les apprentis et autres bandits de la mystique et de l occulte

Alors, plongez dans cette histoire captivante où la tentation de la toute-puissance se heurte à la réalité des limites humaines. Une invitation à la réflexion sur notre nature et sur la place que nous occupons dans un univers où les forces occultes peuvent sembler fascinantes, mais où elles ne sont pas invincibles.
